dt-option.name: language.autoFill
dt-option.summary: Container object for language strings used by AutoFill

type.description:
This is a container object for the language strings used by AutoFill:
* `af-init language.autoFill.button` - Fill type selector button text * `af-init language.autoFill.cancel` - Cancel fill information message * `af-init language.autoFill.fill` - Complete fill selector message * `af-init language.autoFill.fillHorizontal` - Horizontal fill selector message * `af-init language.autoFill.fillVertical` - Vertical fill selector message * `af-init language.autoFill.increment` - Increment fill selector message * `af-init language.autoFill.info` - Fill type selector summary

dt-option.description:
AutoFill make use of a number of strings that are displayed to the end user to explain what action will be performed based on the user input.
A parameters of this object provide the ability to customise those strings to suit your needs. This can be a full translation or a tweak of just one or two strings to match the styling of your site / app.

example.title: Set a fill type information message
